Summary: Bright roundish shape flying in a z pattern hovered then shot straight up.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I were standing just inside the garage when I looked up pointed and said what the hell is that? My wife looked up and said I don't know, We both noticed this bright appearing roundish object move very fast from right to left in a Z pattern . Then it just stopped and shot straight up and vanished. Both of us looked at each other and said that was a UFO. The object moved without sound. I was so amazed at what I was seeing the thought to un holster my cell phone and take a picture did not cross my mind until the object had disappeared.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Fairfield
There were no other sightings in Fairfield on or around September 25th 2011
